name: Chicken Cheese Pizza
description: The pizza is made using Indian spices with an American twist. Try it out!!

name: Pepperoni Pizza
description: Classic pepperoni pizza with a generous topping of pepperoni slices.

name: Vegetarian Supreme Pizza
description: Loaded with a variety of fresh vegetables and cheese, a delight for vegetarians.

name: Margherita Pizza
description: A classic Italian pizza topped with tomatoes, basil, and mozzarella cheese.

name: BBQ Chicken Pizza
description: Tender chicken pieces marinated in barbecue sauce, combined with cheese, and baked to perfection.

name: Hawaiian Pizza
description: A tropical twist with ham, pineapple, and cheese, perfect for a unique flavor experience.

name: Supreme Pizza
description: The ultimate pizza experience with a combination of meat, vegetables, and cheese.

name: Mushroom and Olive Pizza
description: For mushroom and olive lovers, this pizza offers a savory and tangy flavor combination.

name: Buffalo Chicken Pizza
description: Spicy buffalo chicken paired with cheese for a bold and flavorful pizza experience.

name: Meat Lovers Pizza
description: Loaded with various meats such as pepperoni, sausage, bacon, and ham for the ultimate meaty indulgence.
